adventureScreen.completeToUnlock: Complete previous stages to unlock this one!
adventureScreen.logoutMessage: Are you sure you want to log out?
adventureScreen.footerText: The fun way to build mental math skills
adventureScreen.continueJourney: Continue your journey in {zoneName}! {remaining} challenges are waiting!
adventureScreen.firstWelcome: Hoo hoo! Welcome to Abacus Village! This is where every journey begins.
adventureScreen.stageLockedMsg: Hmm... this gate won't open yet. Complete previous challenges first!
adventureScreen.stageCompletedMsg: You've conquered this place! Want to try again for more practice?
adventureScreen.lessonMsg: Explore the secrets hidden inside! Soro will go with you!
adventureScreen.bossMsg: A big challenge awaits! Focus and use all your strength!
adventureScreen.treasureMsg: The treasure of knowledge awaits! Let's conquer it!
adventureScreen.readyMsg: Ready for a new challenge? Soro believes in you!
adventureScreen.newJourneyAwaits: Welcome to {zoneName}! A new journey awaits you!

zoneLocked.title: Not your turn for this zone yet!
zoneLocked.msg80: Oh, you're almost done! Just {remaining} more challenges at {prevZone} and you can explore {currentZone}! Owl Soro believes in you! ğŸ’ªâœ¨
zoneLocked.msg50: Hoo hoo! You're doing great at {prevZone}! Just {remaining} more challenges. Complete them, and {currentZone} with wonders will welcome you! ğŸŒŸ
zoneLocked.msgStarted: Hey there! {currentZone} is waiting for you to conquer {prevZone} first! Just {remaining} more challenges. Don't worry, Owl Soro will accompany you! ğŸ¦‰ğŸ’•
zoneLocked.msgNotStarted: Wait a moment! {currentZone} is waiting for you to complete {prevZone} first! Each zone has fun lessons - follow the order so you don't miss anything! ğŸ—ºï¸âœ¨

village.name: Stage 1: Starter Village
village.subtitle: Getting to know Soroban
village.description: Get familiar with the Soroban abacus - the magical calculating tool!
village.storyIntro: Hoo hoo! Welcome to the Magical Abacus Village! I'm Owl Soro, and I'll guide you to find the Knowledge Treasure! First, let's learn how to use the Soroban - a magical tool for super fast calculations! ğŸ¦‰âœ¨
village.storyComplete: Hoo hoo! Excellent! You've mastered how to use Soroban! Now let's enter the Addition Forest - where numbers are waiting to be combined! ğŸŒŸ

forest.name: Stage 2: Addition Forest
forest.subtitle: Learn addition & Small Friends
forest.description: Learn addition and the Small Friends trick (sum of 5)!
forest.storyIntro: Welcome to Addition Forest! ğŸŒ² Here, numbers love being combined together. You'll learn the "Small Friends" trick - a magical addition formula with sum of 5! Are you ready?
forest.storyComplete: Fantastic! You've conquered Addition Forest and learned the Small Friends trick! Ahead is Subtraction Valley - where you'll learn how to make numbers smaller. Let's go! ğŸ”ï¸

valley.name: Stage 3: Subtraction Valley
valley.subtitle: Learn subtraction & Small Friends
valley.description: Learn subtraction and Small Friends for subtraction!
valley.storyIntro: Hoo hoo! You've arrived at Subtraction Valley! ğŸ”ï¸ In this land, you'll learn how to make numbers smaller with subtraction. The Small Friends trick will help you here too! Let's explore!
valley.storyComplete: Excellent! You've conquered Subtraction Valley! Ahead is Big Friends Hill - hiding important secrets about the number 10. The journey is getting exciting! ğŸŒŸ

hill.name: Stage 4: Big Friends Hill
hill.subtitle: Secret of 10
hill.description: Learn the Big Friends formula - the key to calculating across 10!
hill.storyIntro: Welcome to Big Friends Hill! â­ This is where the most important secret lies: The Big Friends Formula - the key to calculating across 10! Once you master Big Friends, you can solve any calculation!
hill.storyComplete: Magnificent! You've mastered the Big Friends formula! This is a crucial milestone in your journey. Now head to the Combination Tower - where Small Friends and Big Friends will join forces! ğŸ›ï¸

tower.name: Stage 5: Combination Tower
tower.subtitle: Small Friends + Big Friends
tower.description: Combine Small Friends and Big Friends to solve any calculation!
tower.storyIntro: Hoo hoo! You've climbed to Combination Tower! ğŸ›ï¸ Here, Small Friends and Big Friends will unite into a powerful force! When these two friends work together, no calculation is too difficult!
tower.storyComplete: Amazing! You've mastered the combination of Small Friends and Big Friends! Now head to the City of Big Numbers - where you'll conquer 2 and 3 digit numbers! ğŸ™ï¸

city-numbers.name: Stage 6: City of Big Numbers
city-numbers.subtitle: 2-3 digit numbers
city-numbers.description: Conquer addition and subtraction with 2 and 3 digit numbers!
city-numbers.storyIntro: Welcome to the City of Big Numbers! ğŸ™ï¸ Here, 2 and 3 digit numbers live. You'll learn to add and subtract with tens and hundreds - essential skills for every mathematician!
city-numbers.storyComplete: Excellent! You've mastered the City of Big Numbers! Now enter the Kingdom of Thousands - where 4-digit numbers await the young hero! ğŸ‘‘

kingdom.name: Stage 7: Kingdom of Thousands
kingdom.subtitle: 4 digit numbers
kingdom.description: Conquer addition and subtraction with 4 digit numbers - the pinnacle of big numbers!
kingdom.storyIntro: Hoo hoo! You've arrived at the Kingdom of Thousands! ğŸ° This is the kingdom of mighty thousand-numbers. Only the truly skilled can conquer this place. Are you ready for the challenge?
kingdom.storyComplete: Magnificent! You've become a master of the Kingdom of Thousands! But the journey doesn't end - the Wisdom Tower awaits you to learn the extraordinary skill: MENTAL MATH! ğŸ§

mental-tower.name: Stage 8: Wisdom Tower (1 Digit)
mental-tower.subtitle: Basic Mental Math
mental-tower.description: Train Anzan - mental calculation with 1-digit numbers!
mental-tower.storyIntro: Welcome to the Wisdom Tower! ğŸ§  This is where you learn the magical skill: MENTAL MATH (Anzan)! Instead of using a physical abacus, you'll imagine the Soroban in your head. Let's start with 1-digit numbers!
mental-tower.storyComplete: Extraordinary! You've mastered 1-digit mental math! Now challenge the Advanced Wisdom Tower - 2-digit mental math. Do you dare? âš¡

mental-tower-advanced.name: Stage 9: Wisdom Tower (2 Digits)
mental-tower-advanced.subtitle: Advanced Mental Math
mental-tower-advanced.description: Mental calculation with 2-digit numbers - a higher realm!
mental-tower-advanced.storyIntro: Hoo hoo! Advanced Wisdom Tower! ğŸ§ âš¡ This is a higher realm of mental math. You'll calculate mentally with 2-digit numbers - only those with special intellect can do this!
mental-tower-advanced.storyComplete: Outstanding! You've reached the 2-digit mental math realm! Ahead is the Speed Temple - testing your reflexes and speed! Ready? ğŸƒâ€â™‚ï¸

speed-temple.name: Stage 10: Speed Temple
speed-temple.subtitle: Time Challenge
speed-temple.description: Calculate with time limits - testing your reflexes! (Max 4 digits)
speed-temple.storyIntro: Speed Temple - where your reflex limits are tested!
speed-temple.storyComplete: Fast as lightning! You're ready for Candle Peak!

flash-peak-candle.name: Stage 11: Candle Peak
flash-peak-candle.subtitle: Flash 1 Digit
flash-peak-candle.storyIntro: Candle Peak - Flash Anzan with 1-digit numbers!
flash-peak-candle.storyComplete: Excellent! You've conquered Flash 1 digit. Moon Peak awaits!

flash-peak-moon.name: Stage 12: Moon Peak
flash-peak-moon.subtitle: Flash 2 Digits
flash-peak-moon.description: Flash Anzan Moon level - 2-digit numbers super fast!
flash-peak-moon.storyIntro: Moon Peak - Flash Anzan with 2-digit numbers super fast!
flash-peak-moon.storyComplete: LEGENDARY! You've conquered Flash Anzan! Treasure Castle awaits!

treasure-castle.name: DESTINATION: Treasure Castle
treasure-castle.subtitle: Receive Certificate!
treasure-castle.description: Defeat 3 Final Bosses to receive the Add & Sub Certificate!
treasure-castle.storyIntro: ğŸŠ Welcome to Treasure Castle - the destination of the Add & Sub journey!
treasure-castle.storyComplete: ğŸ‰ğŸ† CONGRATULATIONS! You've earned the TREASURE and ADD & SUB MENTAL MATH CERTIFICATE! ğŸ†ğŸ‰

mul-forest.name: Stage 1: Multiplication Forest
mul-forest.subtitle: Learn multiplication
mul-forest.description: Get familiar with multiplication on Soroban!
mul-forest.storyIntro: Hoo hoo! Welcome to Multiplication Forest! ğŸŒ² Here, you'll learn the art of multiplication - when numbers multiply into larger numbers! Multiplication on Soroban is amazing!
mul-forest.storyComplete: Excellent! You've mastered basic multiplication! Ahead is Division Cliff - a new challenge awaits! ğŸ”ï¸

div-cliff.name: Stage 2: Division Cliff
div-cliff.subtitle: Learn division
div-cliff.storyIntro: Welcome to Division Cliff! ğŸ”ï¸ Division is the art of splitting numbers into equal parts. Let's explore the mysterious world of division!
div-cliff.storyComplete: Fantastic! You've conquered Division Cliff! Ahead is the Mix Tower - where multiplication and division combine! ğŸ›ï¸

mix-tower.name: Stage 3: Mix Tower
mix-tower.subtitle: Multiply Ã· Divide
mix-tower.storyIntro: Hoo hoo! You've arrived at Mix Tower! ğŸ›ï¸ Here, multiplication and division will randomly appear. Use all your skills to conquer this challenge!
mix-tower.storyComplete: Amazing! You've conquered Mix Tower! The Complete Certificate awaits at Master Peak! ğŸ†

master-peak.name: Stage 4: Master Peak
master-peak.subtitle: All 4 operations
master-peak.description: Challenge all 4 operations: Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication, Division!
master-peak.storyIntro: Welcome to Master Peak! â›°ï¸ This is the final challenge - where all 4 operations combine. You've come a long way, let's conquer this peak together!
master-peak.storyComplete: Incredible! You've conquered Master Peak! You truly are a Soroban Master! ğŸ“

grand-castle.name: Stage 5: Grand Castle
grand-castle.subtitle: Complete Certificate
grand-castle.description: Receive the Complete Soroban Certificate - mastery of all operations!
grand-castle.storyIntro: Congratulations! Welcome to Grand Castle! ğŸ° The Complete Soroban Certificate awaits you here. You've conquered the entire Treasure Quest!
grand-castle.storyComplete: Hoo hoo! Congratulations Soroban Master! You've earned the Complete Certificate - the highest recognition of Soroban mastery! ğŸ‰ğŸ†

cave-multiply.name: Stage 1: Multiplication Cave
cave-multiply.subtitle: Times Tables
cave-multiply.description: Learn times tables and multiplication on Soroban!
cave-multiply.storyIntro: Multiplication Cave - where you learn to multiply numbers many times!
cave-multiply.storyComplete: Amazing! You've mastered multiplication. Division Lake awaits!

lake-divide-basic.name: Stage 2: Basic Division Lake
lake-divide-basic.subtitle: Divide by 2-7
lake-divide-basic.description: Learn basic division - dividing by small numbers!
lake-divide-basic.storyIntro: Basic Division Lake - where you learn to divide numbers into parts!
lake-divide-basic.storyComplete: Great! You've mastered basic division. Advanced Division Lake awaits!

lake-divide-advanced.name: Stage 3: Advanced Division Lake
lake-divide-advanced.subtitle: 2-digit Division
lake-divide-advanced.description: Divide by 8-9 and divide large numbers!
lake-divide-advanced.storyIntro: Advanced Division Lake - challenge with larger numbers!
lake-divide-advanced.storyComplete: Excellent! You've mastered Multiply and Divide. Four Operations Arena awaits!

arena-four.name: Stage 4: Four Operations Arena
arena-four.subtitle: All 4 Operations
arena-four.description: Practice and compete with all 4 operations!
arena-four.storyIntro: Four Operations Arena - challenge for champions!
arena-four.storyComplete: You've conquered Four Operations! Mental Math Tower awaits!

mental-muldiv.name: Stage 5: Mental Math Tower
mental-muldiv.subtitle: Anzan Mul Div
mental-muldiv.description: Mental calculation for Multiply & Divide without abacus!
mental-muldiv.storyIntro: Mental Math Tower - train Anzan for Multiply & Divide!
mental-muldiv.storyComplete: Extraordinary! You can mentally calculate Mul Div. Speed Temple awaits!

speed-muldiv.name: Stage 6: Speed Temple
speed-muldiv.subtitle: Super Speed Mul Div
speed-muldiv.description: Multiply and divide with time limits! (Max 4 digits)
speed-muldiv.storyIntro: Speed Temple - test your Mul Div speed!
speed-muldiv.storyComplete: Fast as lightning! Mixed Peak awaits!

mixed-peak.name: Stage 7: Mixed Peak
mixed-peak.subtitle: Perfect 4 Operations
mixed-peak.description: Mixed 4 operations at the highest level! (Max 4 digits)
mixed-peak.storyIntro: Mixed Peak - where 4 operations blend perfectly!
mixed-peak.storyComplete: Perfect! You're ready for the Supreme Castle!

supreme-castle.name: DESTINATION: Supreme Castle
supreme-castle.subtitle: Complete Certificate!
supreme-castle.description: Defeat 3 Final Bosses to receive the Complete Certificate!
supreme-castle.storyIntro: ğŸ‘‘ Welcome to Supreme Castle - the pinnacle of Soroban!
supreme-castle.storyComplete: ğŸ‰ğŸ‘‘ğŸ† CONGRATULATIONS! You've earned the COMPLETE SOROBAN CERTIFICATE! You are a MASTER! ğŸ†ğŸ‘‘ğŸ‰

adventureCert.addSubDesc: Conquered the Addition & Subtraction journey on Soroban
